metadata.description: Matrix company that hosts software and services that have one goal in common: to offer useful and high quality services to the masses.

aboutus.title: About us
aboutus.description: SDL Platforms stands as a beacon at the forefront of technological innovation. Our team embodies a culture fueled by boundless creativity, unwavering collaboration, and an insatiable hunger for excellence.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace change and continuously seek new ways to improve and evolve. Innovation is in our DNA, and we encourage bold ideas and experimentation.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We empower our users by providing intuitive, user-friendly solutions. Whether itâ€™s through our web, mobile or desktop applications, we aim to make technology accessible to all.

community.title: Community
community.description: We recognize that our success is intertwined with the success of our community. We actively engage with users, partners, and stakeholders to build lasting relationships.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to responsible practices. Our digital services prioritize efficiency, security, and environmental consciousness.

thimsmarket.name: Thims Market
thimsmarket.description:
Offer to explore a wide number of website templates for NextJS.

Key features:

  • Visibility and Reach: We offer quality content to a wide and diverse audience of people interested in website creation. By publishing your templates on the marketplace, you can increase your visibility and reach a wider audience, generating more downloads and therefore more revenue.
  • Community and Feedback: Become part of an active community of designers and developers, receiving valuable feedback that will make templates improve based on community needs. Additionally, positive user comments will increase reputation and attract more customers.
  • Sustainable Business Model: This marketplace offers a sustainable business model for creators. We have a shared income structure that motivates you to create high-quality, long-term products, which generates high benefits for everyone.
